author: jacopoc
msg: Following David Jones's suggestions in OFBIZ-364, I've added a new attribute to the "form" element:
It can be used to pass a custom list size (differnt from the actual list size) that can be useful for pagination purposes under some circumstances.
The attribute can accept the ${} notation.
